humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions the size of the largest invasive duct carcinoma tumor as 2.5 cm x 2.5 cm x 2.0 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions the size of the infiltrating duct carcinoma as 2.5 cm (2.5 by 2.5 by 2.0 cm), which falls within the T2 category. T2 stage is defined as 'Tumor size >2 cm but ≤5 cm'. Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
